name: biomni-advanced-web-search-claude
title: Biomni: Advanced Web Search Claude
description: Conduct advanced web search using Claude AI to collect relevant information with citations through multiple rounds of web searches. Requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.
content:
Overview

Conduct advanced web search using Claude AI to collect relevant information with citations through multiple rounds of web searches. This tool uses Claude's AI capabilities to iteratively refine search queries and gather comprehensive, well-cited information on complex topics. Requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable.

Input Parameters

  • query (required): The search query or research question
  • max_searches (optional): Maximum number of search iterations to perform (default: 5)
  • max_retries (optional): Maximum number of retry attempts for failed searches (default: 3)

Biological Use Case

Ideal for comprehensive literature discovery when researching complex biological topics that require multiple perspectives and sources. Use cases include: surveying emerging research areas, gathering background information for grant proposals, identifying key papers and review articles across multiple databases, and building comprehensive bibliographies for systematic reviews. The AI-powered iterative search helps uncover connections between related topics and ensures broad coverage of the research landscape.

Output

Returns a text file (search_results.txt) containing synthesized information from multiple web searches with proper citations and source URLs. The results include relevant findings organized by topic, with direct quotes and references to source materials.

Category

literature
